Address: Hancorp Plaza, 72 Tran Dang Ninh, Dich Vong Ward, Cau Giay District, Hanoi, Vietnam
Tel: (+84) 2873 040 030
Email: ncsoft@gmail.com
introduction_content: NCsoft is a company specializing in software production with millions of users for the US, Australia, and New Zealand markets. With a team of quality engineers and staff in the field of research and development of products in the field of web solutions, mobile applications, we have produced many products with optimal quality and continuously improved progress, satisfying the most demanding customers. The young environment, sociable management has been with the product since the first days, so we understand that a flexible working mode that values each individual is what helps NCsoft assert its strengths and reach out.
contact_title-1: Please email us at any time.
contact_title-2: We are ready to listen and support you.
provide_title_home: NCsoft has been consulting and providing software solutions for a wide range of businesses in the US, Australia, and New Zealand markets. Customer satisfaction is the top goal that NCsoft aims at.
address_detail_footer: Hancorp Plaza, 72 Tran Dang Ninh, Dich Vong Ward, Cau Giay District, Hanoi, Vietnam
programming_language_title_home: At NCsoft, a team of seasoned software engineers always apply the most advanced programming languages and technologies to fulfill the wishes of business organizations in an optimal way.
description_inprove_home: NCsoft has been trusted and cooperated by many small and medium enterprises. We help businesses increase their value by advising on IT solutions, custom software development, web design,...
title_recruitment: Join us to make a breakthrough. It's been a journey and we're all just at the beginning
common_no_info_recruitment: We don't have any recruitment news at the moment

working_time_contact: Monday - Friday, From 8:30 am to 5:30 pm.

css_tooltip: CSS is a styling language used to describe the appearance and formatting of HTML elements
react_tooltip: JavaScript library for building user interfaces (UIs) using reusable components.
